resources.string: Freecash.com is an additional income site where you can do hundreds of tasks.
You must update to continue using it.
Things to Do for the Award
1- Register on Freecash.com site or mobile application.
2- Type vrkrinspect in the reference code section.
3- Support the lottery by doing various tasks.
4- Go to your profile and take a screenshot showing the information under the General heading.
5- Upload the screenshot by clicking the Task button and wait for it to be approved.
That is all. You are ready to enter the award and get your share of the pool.
I confirm that I am using the vrkrinspect code at freecash.com.
Okx.com is a crypto exchange that came to the fore with its promotions.
1- Start the registration process on Okx.com site or mobile application.
2- Write 56370804 in the reference section while registering.
3- Make the necessary verifications for the account to be created.
4- You can open your surprise box.
I confirm that I am using the referral code at okx.com.
I have read and approved the VLikeit terms of use.
Bitpanda.com is one of the reliable crypto exchanges in Turkey.

Once you are verified for the Freecash mission, 5% of the amount you earn on Freecash.com will be added to the Freecash award in the Rewards section on a regular basis. You can expand this pool by doing more tasks and verify these amounts above.
By following our Twitter account, you can be instantly informed about all offers.

The Okx mission consists of two phases. The mystery box you earn after completing your first stage registration process. The second stage is another mystery box that you earn on your first trade of $50. For each task you do, you will also give a box to the pool as a gift, and you can verify these amounts above.

Once you\'ve been verified for the Freecash mission, you can now participate in all Freecash sweepstakes we\'ll be doing. There are no restrictions on your right to participate in the award, especially for the opening.

Once you\'ve been verified for the Okx mission, you can now participate in all the Okx draws we\'ll be doing. There are no restrictions on your right to participate in the award, especially for the opening.
In this section, you must write the registration date to OKX.
Review the tasks, complete the ones you like and send them to us.
Let\'s review and confirm as soon as possible.
Participate in prizes, multiply your earnings!
That is all! Now you can start!
• To participate in the Prize, you must have verified your account and fulfilled the task of the respective reward.
• The number of participants in the award is initially 100.
• If there is not enough participation in the award, 5 will be deducted from the number of participants that must be reached at 12 o\'clock every day.
You can collect your daily reward here every 24 hours.
(In case of multiple account usage, all accounts opened by the same person are banned.)
